details.title: Modified non oscillatory central difference scheme for conservation laws
details.abstract: The non oscillatory central difference scheme developed by Nessyahu and Tadmor is modified using a method similar to that in the modified conservation element and solution element scheme (CE/ SE scheme). The resulting scheme is a two point second order central scheme, which not only retains the advantages of a simple Riemann solver free recipe, but is also easier to implement near boundaries. Numerical results for several sample flow problems show that the present scheme has higher accuracy and better shock resolution than the original one.
